name: 写真 - Replicate Reality (jam edition)
description:
写真 - photograph (lit. "replicate" or "reproduce" + "reality")

You wake up in an abandoned building with no memory of who you are or how you got there. All you have to help you solve the mystery is a camera that takes... odd photos, and a stranger who wants to assist. You can only hope this will be enough.

PLEASE READ THE INCLUDED CONTENT WARNINGS FOR THIS STORY. They can be accessed after the start menu. Note that this story has an unsettling  tone overall, and may be uncomfortable in ways other than the listed content warnings.

Cover image original photo by Darius Krause from Pexels.
